::KitKat::

She slowly opened her eyes and saw Destructor standing over her.  She 
smiled. "Thank you."  She sat up and rubbed her eyes."HOw long was I 
out for?"  SHe got out of the bed and went to the sink.  She splashed 
some cool water on her face to help wake her up. She wiped her face 
with a dry cloth and looked at Destructor. "Want some thing to eat? 
I'm starved. Come on. We can go to the mess hall before we get to 
work." She started to walk out of her room.  She felt a small smile 
creep across her face.  She felt like she had a team again.  A team 
member that was loyal to her. Someone who wouldn't turn and kill her 
at  first chance they got.  For the first time in a long time, she 
felt a sence of commeradery.  Like she had a friend again.  
Destructor was starting to get to her.  She felt comfortable around 
him.  Like he was someone she could trust.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>   Destructor emerged from his cr chamber a new man. His powers 
fully 
> restored. He yawned and hoped famine had finished the final 
testing. He 
> contacted him on the comm..."Is it prepared?"...."Yes sir..come 
when ready."
>   Hw walked towards the door where kit kat sleeped. He opened the 
door with 
> his own captian override in case it was locked. He watched her 
sleep for a 
> moment. Not wanting to wake her. He glided his hand across her 
cheek..."Wake 
> up...we are ready."
